snippet: Florida A&M University insists in legal papers filed Monday that a drum major, Robert Champion, not the school, bears the ultimate responsibility for his hazing death last November.
abstract: Florida A&M University insists in legal papers that a drum major, Robert Champion, not the school, bears the ultimate responsibility for his hazing death in November 2011; asserts he consented to the hazing to gain respect from his colleagues.
lead_paragraph: Florida A&M University insists in legal papers filed Monday that a drum major, Robert Champion, not the school, bears the ultimate responsibility for his hazing death last November.

headline.seo: Florida A&M Holds Drum Major Responsible for His Hazing Death
headline.main: Florida: University Holds Drum Major Responsible For His Death In Hazing
headline.print_headline: Florida: University Holds Drum Major Responsible For His Death In Hazing
